effects.display_string: Set: Your Sinister Strike, Pistol Shot, and Ambush have a 35% chance to Ethereal Rampage, dealing 30% increased damage as Shadow.
(4) Set: Ethereal Rampage additionally increases the damage of your next Between the Eyes by 15%, stacking up to 4 times.

Transmogrified to:
Headgear of the Undermine Revolutionary

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Dispatch by 6% stacking up to 5 times. Dispatch has a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!

(4) Set: Roll the Bones has a 40% increased chance of granting additional combat enhancements and also applies 1 stack of  Winning Streak! for each combat enhancement granted.

Stacks applied by Roll the Bones can exceed the normal Winning Streak! maximum of 5.
Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Dispatch by 6% stacking up to 5 times. Dispatch has a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!

(4) Set: Roll the Bones has a 40% increased chance of granting additional combat enhancements and also applies 1 stack of  Winning Streak! for each combat enhancement granted.

Stacks applied by Roll the Bones can exceed the normal Winning Streak! maximum of 5.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 6,592 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 173 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,162 Agility. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 93,596 Nature damage over 8 sec.
